senses.sense_definition: The name of a central warrior character in the Indian epic Mahabharata who fought for the Kauravas; the son of Kunti and the sun god Surya.

examples.text: In the ancient epic, <w>Karna</w> is often depicted as a tragic hero caught between loyalty and righteousness.
Scholars frequently discuss the complex moral dilemmas faced by <w>Karna</w> throughout the great war.
